name: Mandala Hang Drum Studio - Play & Record your own tunes
name_original: Mandala Hang Drum Studio - Play & Record your own tunes
description:
Mandala hang drum is the first
simulator of the 1st generation hang drum for iPad & iPhone & iPod Touch!

The top (Ding) side has a center 'note' hammered into it with 8 'tone fields' hammered around it. The bottom is a simpler surface that has a rolled hole in the center with a tuned note that can be created when the rim is struck.

* First iPad hang drum app ever!
* Playing with the pitch is a lot of fun!
* Reverb effect
* Record your tunes
* Tone volume change
* Realistic sound
* Multiple touch
